name: MTLCommandBufferEncoderInfo
desc: An object describing the execution of commands from a specific command encoder.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: The label string of the encoder.

items.name: var errorState: MTLCommandEncoderErrorState
items.desc: The execution status of the command encoder.

items.name: var debugSignposts: [String]
items.desc: An array of debug signposts that Metal recorded during execution of commands in the command encoder.

items.name: enum MTLCommandEncoderErrorState
items.desc: Possible error conditions for the command encoderâ€™s commands.
